TopicTitle: Fragmenter - This one's a little weird

Articles.Content:
I am probably exploiting the way drag is modeled by using so many parallel stages.

I\'ve used it to achieve Kerbolar escape velocity and to orbit Kerbol at less than 1 million km.

This thing is [move]Crrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrraaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaayyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyzzzeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee...[/move]. It taught me how to efficiently drop empty fuel tanks though with well positioned fuel leads, so thanks! . Currently it\'s.... 98Tm away and travelling at 15555m/s, it\'s escaped the sun pretty much xD. TERAMETERS?!?!?! With the ability to make this from STOCK parts, I do hope that they add more planets soon, then try to travel to each and every one of them in a galactic pub crawl of sorts... More solar systems would work with this bad boy too 8).
